description: They have collaborated with one of the finest knitters in Veneto, Italy, along with Biella Yarn, by Südwolle, to develop a line of ski sweaters in 100% fine merino wool. The inspiration for these sweaters are from the 70's , but they have reworked them to be more functional and comfortable. They are knitted with a 2/48 yarn, with ribbed details and color block panels. The quality has a thick hand-feel, that is similar to a "scuba" quality, but it's breathable and soft to the skin. This jacket is finished with an Italian zipper, and a mock neck collar. Use it as a mid-layer paired with any of their SNØ base layers and the Voss long johns.
name: We Norwegians Hafjell Crew Neck - Mens
